attributes.action: repeal the ban on licenced, legally held pistols.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A ban on legally held, licensed pistols was brought into force in 1997, in an effort to try and reduce crime committed using pistols. This ban, however good its intentions, have completely failed, as crime involving pistols has continued to rise at the same rate as before the ban. All the ban has achieved is stop law-abiding citizens and Olympic athletes from participating in a popular sport, and has done nothing to stop the criminal element from arming themselves, as criminals buy them from the black market, and never from legal sources.

The ban is not only unfair, but has also completely failed in its stated goals, and we call for it to be repealed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
